syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    "aws.telemetry": false,
    "files.associations": {
        "*.hcl": "terraform",
        "Pulumi.*.yaml": "yaml"
    },
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "terraform.experimentalFeatures.prefillRequiredFields": true,
    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
    "files.autoSaveDelay": 1000,
    "redhat.telemetry.enabled": false,
    "gitlens.telemetry.enabled": false,
    "amazonQ.telemetry": false,
    "telemetry.telemetryLevel": "off",
    "vscode-kubernetes.helm-path": "/opt/homebrew/bin/helm",
    "vscode-kubernetes.helm-path-mac": "/opt/homebrew/bin/helm",
    "vscode-kubernetes.kubectl-path-mac": "/usr/local/bin/kubectl",
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "workbench.startupEditor": "none",
    "window.confirmBeforeClose": "keyboardOnly",
    "git.allowNoVerifyCommit": true,
    "git.alwaysSignOff": true,
    "git.enableCommitSigning": true,
    "git.confirmNoVerifyCommit": false,
    "githubPullRequests.pullBranch": "never",
    "terminal.integrated.inheritEnv": false,
    "python.terminal.launchArgs": [],
    "terminal.integrated.profiles.linux": {
        "bash": {
            "path": "/bin/bash",
            "args": [
                "--rcfile",
                "$HOME/.bashrc"
            ]
        }
    },
    "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "bash",
    "terminal.integrated.automationProfile.linux": {},
    "python.terminal.shellIntegration.enabled": true,
    "amazonQ.suppressPrompts": {
        "amazonQChatDisclaimer": true
    },
    "terminal.integrated.env.osx": {
        "Q_NEW_SESSION": "1",
        "PULUMI_SKIP_UPDATE_CHECK": "true"
    },
    "editor.accessibilitySupport": "off",
    "amazonQ.workspaceIndex": true,
    "workbench.activityBar.location": "top",
    "editor.fontSize": 14,
    "editor.fontFamily": "'VictorMono Nerd Font','VictorMono NF', 'JetBrains Mono', 'JetBrainsMono Nerd Font', 'JetBrains Mono Medium', monospace",
    "terminal.integrated.fontLigatures.enabled": true,
    "editor.fontLigatures": true,
    "editor.fontVariations": true,
    "editor.formatOnSave": true,
    "editor.quickSuggestions": {
        "other": true,
        "comments": false,
        "strings": true
    },
    "editor.quickSuggestionsDelay": 10,
    "editor.parameterHints.enabled": true
}"}
